patthana14.37:1.1: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo ca naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
patthana14.37:2.1: Araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana14.37:3.1: Saraṇañca araṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana14.37:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana14.37:5.1: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1)
patthana14.37:6.1: Araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanaaraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.37:7.1: Nahetuyā dve, na ārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca …pe… napurejāte cattāri …pe… nakamme dve …pe… naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ …pe… navippayutte dve …pe… novigate tīṇi.
patthana14.37:8.1: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṃsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana14.37:9.1: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa ca naaraṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
patthana14.37:10.1: Araṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
patthana14.37:11.1: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.37:12.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta.
patthana14.37:13.1: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, pacchājātapaccayena paccayo, kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:14.1: Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.37:15.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta …pe… nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe nanissaye pañca …pe… napurejāte cha …pe… nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri …pe… noavigate cattāri.
